entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
